description.en:
$867 CRYPTO is a free-to-play platform that allows users to compete in desktop and mobile casino tournament-style games, for huge prizes! We are an integrated casino with multiple games that offer tiered prizes to High Rollers and VIPs! $867 CRYPTO is all about the party! As we continue to develop more custom casinos, mobile apps, and skill-based games - WATCH these JACKPOT giveaways get even bigger!

The casino platform will allow holders of $867 tokens to access and play a wide range of casino style, casino tournament style games, and skill based games. Minimum holding requirement details will be revealed as we get closer to the release of our V2 gaming platform. There is no direct wagering of the $867 token or any other crypto currencies in our Casino. You never have to worry about losing any of your investment. All games are free to play, but entry into the exclusive ""$867 High Roller"" rooms will be based on your holdings of the $867 token, and will be verified via wallet integration.
